# Introduction

```{r eval = F, echo = F}
library(agiler)
xx <- AGILE_Seed %>% 
  select(-ZeroTannin, -Helium, -Helium_Sut18, -SeedComment)
write.csv(xx, "myLDP_Seed.csv", row.names = F)
```

`r shiny::icon("save")` [myLDP_Seed.csv](myLDP_Seed.csv)

```{r}
xx <- read.csv("myLDP_Seed.csv", stringsAsFactors = T)
```

```{r}
summary(xx$Size)
summary(xx$CotyledonColor)
summary(xx$TestaColor)
summary(xx$TestaPattern)
summary(xx$BlackTesta)
```
